2015 janadhipathiwaranayedi saha mahamathiwaranayedi shri lanka nidahas pakshikayan pa‡∑äramukha pa‡∑äragathishili janathawa mula kota balayata path wi owun atharaman kota dakunu aasiyawe didulana rajyayak lesa sanwardhanaya wemin pawathi rata winashaya kara genayamin janathawata jiwathwima pawa nohaki samajayak nirmanaya kara athi nayakathwayan pa‡∑ärathikshepa karamin gam danaw sisara naengana janatha handata patala paksha amathaka kara mohothak sawan dena men me mohoth api oben eka handin illa sitinnemuga mema janatha wirodhi rajayata saha owun samanga pa‡∑äragathishili muhunuwarin peni sitina pa‡∑ärathigami balawegayan parajayata pathkirime eekayana aramuna pera dariwa godanaengana nawa janatha balawegayata nayakathwaya diya haki ekama nayakayanan obayaga ema nayakathwaya nobiyawa nosali bara ganna lesa game balawegaya wana api obathumagen illa sitimuga oba ganna ema thiranaya samanga gam danaw sisara wihidunu sanwidhanajala godanangamin api oba samanga ekwimata sadi pahadi sitina bawath pa‡∑ärakasha karannemuga kawara badha hamuwe wuwada nosalila apa amathaka nokotala apa wenuwen peni sitinala oba samanga api athwal banda ganna bawa mema sammelanayedi sapatha kara sitinnemu.
